metadata.title: CVE-2020-17495 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: django-celery-results through 1.2.1 stores task results in the database. Among the data it stores are the variables passed into the tasks. The variables may contain sensitive cleartext information that does not belong unencrypted in the database.

criterions.comment: python-django-celery-results package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
